keyTakeAways: Cold water does not add extra shine to hair and is unnecessary for achieving healthy hair appearance.
Split ends cannot be repaired and require a haircut as the only solution; products only offer temporary cosmetic fixes.
Hair growth speed cannot be increased by cutting hair or using any product; such claims are false.
Regular hair washing is essential to prevent buildup of oil, dirt, and bacteria, which can lead to itchy scalps and dandruff.
Dry shampoo can be used safely once between washes, but overuse without washing out leads to yeast buildup and scalp issues.
People with oily hair may benefit from stronger cleansing, while those with dry hair should consider sulfate-free shampoos to preserve natural oils.
Healthy hair care focuses on scalp health, similar to facial care, emphasizing proper cleansing and avoiding buildup.
